name: Proud Parent
text:
I bought cabinets from ProSource at the end of August. The date of install would be Sept 1st - 5th. I am still waiting on Sept 25th for the cabinets to arrive. No date can be given... I have told them I am waiting to sell the house and the cabinets are costing me the mortgage. How long will I have to wait? No one can tell me. I have several interested buyers in the home right now. This company does not care about you or your project.

***UPDATE SEPT 29TH***
I had the pleasure to work with Trent a ProSource employee. He was great to find the answers for me that I did not have. I had the company delivering the cabinets calling me providing me updates directly. As a customer if I could go through ProSource myself I would. I appreciate the follow through.

resp.text:
Hello,
Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. Client and member satisfaction is our top priority and we’re happy we were able to get in contact with you to discuss finding a resolution. We appreciate your feedback and communication with the showroom as well as your patience and understanding.

name: Brad McClellan
text: Large selection. Not pushy salespeople. Knowledgeable.

name: Nick Kcin
text: No good, would not recommend. I was sold on the panel flooring we have being pulled up to repair the areas were gaps were located, this wasn't done. All the crew did was squirt glue into the gaps and jam them forward to join them. This resulted in not all the gaps being fixed, and the ones glued a few of them have mounds of dried glue sticking out.  The flooring that was placed was fine, but the 1/4 round wasn't painted/stained on the cut ends, the transitions were nailed in (which is fine) leaving  sharp nail heads sticking up which would easily cut a foot. I guess this job would have been ok if it was cheap but it was not.

resp.text: We're sorry to hear this. We know that our team went out and tried to fix your older flooring but put in new flooring that you loved. Please give us a call and we can help you out, thanks!

name: Beth Eddings
text: I cannot share enough good things about our experiences with Hill's. The quality of their work is wonderful and they stand behind it. We purchased some beautiful tile from them in 2016 transforming our kitchen and bath, and then in 2018 returned to purchase all new bedroom carpet before our daughter was born. Each time we've been presented with affordable options that are still of high quality and any time someone we know is looking for flooring I recommend Hill's in Hueytown. They offer all the same products as flooring places in Birmingham but at a fraction of the price due to being a small family shop.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your lovely review, Beth! Come see us anytime and we're so pleased you're happy!

name: Debbie Kleist
text: I highly recommend Hill's Carpet and Floor Coverings. The technicians arrived exactly when they told me they would, were experienced and efficient in their work and finished flooring my entire house in 2 days. They were neat and courteous as they worked. My floor looks beautiful and the price was reasonable. If you need flooring work in Hueytown, Hill's is the company to call.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Mrs.Kleist! Come back and see us anytime!

name: Greg Marlin
text: I've been using Mr. Hill since the early '90's. Prices are always reasonable, products are great, & installs always go well. I would highly recommend!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your review!

name: Diane C
text: I had a terrible experience and would not recommend or use them again. A 1 day installation turned into 5 visits to my home, they have not corrected everything they messed up, and they destroyed all the door frames. They tell you they've have been in business for a long time, but the owners are not the same, and neither is the quality of work.

resp.text: We have been patient in our reply and have decided it is time to respond since you will not take our repeated calls. We understand your frustration with the initial installation of your flooring which resulted in our decision to terminate the original contractor. Obviously we were frustrated as well and we spoke with you at length over the phone about this. The errors he made have been corrected.  You called again with concern that the carpet was not fastened correctly in one area and, though after inspecting we determined there wasn't a problem, we still agreed to have a contractor come and re-stretch it in an effort to resolve your concern.  We disagree that "they destroyed all the door frames".  Yes, there was some slight damage done to some of the door frames but they were far from being "destroyed".  Your salesman offered to repaint those areas himself but you declined.  We have gone as far as discounting your invoice three times in an effort to appease you.  We have a two year labor warranty and we stand behind it.  The quality of work performed by subsequent contractors to correct the errors of the first was excellent.  Hill's Carpet & Floor Coverings has been in business at our main location since 1986.  The original owner sold the business to his nephew some 9 years ago and the original owner remains active in the business.  We are proud of our history of serving the greater Birmingham area by offering quality products, competitive prices, and professional installation.  We're proud of and humbled by so many positive reviews on line.  We recognize that the original installation fell short of the last standard and we have tried diligently to work with you to resolve your remaining issue.

name: Kelly Finnegan
text: We chose to go with Hill’s over a box store like Home Depot or Lowes and we are so glad we did. They were so incredibly helpful throughout the whole process. They let us take home several samples until we found the right one. They explained the different types of carpets and the benefits of each one. Mr Hill personally came out and measured and quoted the room. Installers were right on time and worked quickly and did such a wonderful job. We love our carpet and plan to use Hill’s in the future when we redo our kitchen flooring.

resp.text: Wow! Thank you so much for your honest review! We really do take pride in doing our best to bring beauty to your home without the hassle. Remember us and come back to see us anytime! Thanks again!!

name: Maria Holmes
text:
FYI LONG REVIEW: I originally contacted Hill's back in Aug to refinish our hardwood floors. Very pleasant experience with Clark with setting up my consultation. Cullen came out and did the consultation with me and my husband. It went well, and the price was very reasonable. He advised me that he would email me the proposal and to call him when we were ready.

I waited for the email but never received it. However, I still called a week later and let him know we were ready to schedule but that I still haven't received the proposal email. I didn't feel comfortable calling to pay my deposit over the phone without a proposal. He wasn't at the office when I called but was going to call once he got settled. When he finally called, I wasn't available but I still didn't get a proposal email.

So I waited before calling back. Then Clark called and left a msg asking if my consultation went well and if I was ready to schedule. At that time I was not because I wanted the proposal on paper with the amount I was quoted. Never heard back.

So I called again Monday, 10/12 and spoke with a gentleman about scheduling (yes I was still willing to use this company because the price I was quoted was the best). He got my name and address and tried to look up an invoice or proposal and guess what, there was none!! He asked who did my consultation and I told him Cullen. He said he would get him to call me. Days later, I'm still waiting on my call.

The other 2 companies I've contacted this week have been very responsive and gotten me proposals within the same day of the consultation. I'd rather pay the extra $ for great customer service and communication.

resp.text: Ms. Holmes, your experience with our company is very regrettable.  We strive to establish a meaningful relationship with all our customers resulting in a satisfying experience throughout the purchasing process.  It is unfortunate that in your case we failed to do that and we apologize.  Having been in business in the greater Birmingham area since 1987 we're very humbled and gratified by the excellent rankings we have on social media on Facebook, Google, and the Better Business Bureau.  We appreciate your candidness and again, apologize for not exceeding your expectations.  Your review is a reminder of the importance of delivering a satisfying experience for each and every potential customer every day.

I went with the Mohawk LVP and am thoroughly pleased with the installation and customer service received from Hill's Carpet and Flooring (Helena). The install crew was prompt, super efficient, and extremely professional.  They exceeded my expectations, especially with cleaning up, and returning things to their original place. If you want good old fashioned customer service then you should definitely check them out!

name: frank sebert
text:
Please do yourself and choose wisely before using Hill's, I used the Helena store and can not and would not use or recommend any Hill's seeing how they all the same owner and installers.
I will tell you about my experience, The carpet is nice and seems to be installed well, this is not where the problem is and if you enjoy paying someone to rub paint off your walls and base boards then tell you" well that just happens" then you have found your place. My wife and I spent over an hour sweeping dusting and vacuuming after the installers left angry and in a hurry, when i told them I expected them to vacuum and clean what mess they made during the install, just got in the van and left?!
I will tell you the salesman did at least get me a whole pint of paint so I could repaint what HILL'S CARPET should have taken care of, there wasn't even an offer to say "hey how bout we at least knock of $20.00 or $25.00 for your time and trouble." Granted by what it would have taken to make this right it isn't a major deal, but do you really want to spend your hard earned money and have to clean up and paint a house you just cleaned and painted? Then be disrespected and talked down to in your own home? Please make a better choice than I did. There are many carpet stores in the area and I know most will appreciate your business,
I can tell you for a fact unforunately that HILL'S CARPET will not.

resp.text: We're sorry for the bad service at the time but you may call us at our office anytime. Also thank you for rating honestly. We've recently expanded our showroom in Helena to display a lot more product lines which greatly expands choices and our crews are amazing! Come back and give us another chance to wow you! Thanks!

text: Needed a quick install to sell a house. Customer service was outstanding. Jim worked with me and helped find me a great deal on new flooring. Installed two days later and looks great. name: Ashley Carson
text: Most definitely a one stop shop!!! I am so very happy we chose American Flooring, Cabinet, and Granite to take care of all our needs in building our new home. My husband an I finally built our dream house this year;  we were treated like family from all the staff and installers from start to finish.  We did LVP flooring throughout it is absolutely gorgeous. They helped us pick out the perfect tile and accent pieces for our walk-in shower. The solid wood cabinets were just fantastic they went perfect with the quartzite we chose for the kitchen an master bath, it makes my heart beat fast, it's so beautiful. They have a large selection from all over he world, slabs I have never seen before anywhere.                                        I want to thank everyone there for making our experience a little less painful, anytime you build a house things come up and we were very pleased how they worked with us on our scheduling.  I highly recommend American Flooring, Cabinet, and Granite to all my family and friends. We are so very happy!!!!

name: Melanie Lobel
text: First visit to American Carpet and had the best experience picking out carpet. Johnny Marino was such a professional and assisted me with making great selections at a terrific price. They were able to meet my installation requirements immediately. The quality and service was so remarkable that I went back 2 days later and purchased gorgeous marble for my fireplace surround. What a pleasure doing business with American Carpet and Flooring. Definitely ask for Johnny. Great guy.

text:
The sales lady was fantastic, she pretty much took care of everything over the phone, I went to the store and was out of there in 10 min.
A 10 for Marisa !

name: Gerald Drakeford
text:
Mr. Don Williams always has a warm smile and greeting each time we visit the store. Johnny facilitated our flooring and granite orders and was great to work with as well!

We had hardwood floors as well as granite countertops installed.  Glynn and his crew did a great job on the flooring. They were on time each day and were very attentive to details during the installation.

Likewise, the guys that installed our granite countertops were top shelf as well, detail oriented, and very professional.

Would definitely recommend American Carpets and Flooring!

name: Kishina Brown
text: I was looking for purchasing new flooring for the rest of my house. I walked in with a large piece of carpet in hand to see what would look good with my new carpet. As I entered I was not greeted. I noticed three men in a corner talking and I walked close by and again never greeted. So I will not ever step foot in this store again.

name: James Sessions
text: My wife and I decided to totally remodel our master bathroom which was a big deal for us.  After making visits to several stores and getting conflicting advice on what we could and should not do. We were so confused but knew how we wanted the new bathroom to look.   I suggested that we stop by American Flooring which we decided to be the last stop before leaving Mobile and head to Baldwin County or even Pensacola. American Flooring should have been our first stop.  We met Johnny Marino and shared with him what we wanted to see in our new and updated bathroom project.  He took our the contractor's proposal along with many pictures that my wife had gotten off the internet, how we wanted our new bathroom to look.  He provided us with expert advice.  He took the time to tell us what we needed.  He was more than a salesman... I considered him an expert in flooring.  We are so excited, we cannot wait until the job is completed.

name: Richard Moore
text:
NEVER AGAIN!
This level of incompetence is unfathomable. My installer calls me up to verify directions, ten minutes later one of the employees calls me to tell me "We can't sell you this flooring" ( That the salesman practically begged us to pay for weeks earlier) Half my house is on my porch and in my yard at this point. They had their third "problem" reported two days earlier but didn't bother to call the people who had bought any of it. The sales man was an absolute joke. I don't know whos brother-in-law he is but that is the ONLY way he could keep his job!
The Installers....were AWESOME! (Sub contracted).
This is only part of the issues I had....all I can say is,
American Flooring will NEVER get another dime from me.

text: We did a major  2 1/2 bathroom remodel at our home and American Flooring Cabinets & Granite did a great job! It did not stop there she took the time to pick out the paint color that would compliment the exotic granite and porcelain tile.  The  selection of porcelain tile and granite options we viewed that day at American Flooring Cabinets & Granite was  top quality.  The workers did a top notch job.  At the completion of the job, Jennifer came out and looked over everything and made sure we were satisfied with everything.  All of our questions were answered.  Our future flooring projects will definitely be handled through American Flooring.

name: HM M
text: I walked in and was not greeted. I walked up to two people at desks and they didn't seem interested and couldn't seem to help even though I had a tile in my hand. They called another guy. I asked him about finding a similar size to my vintage tile because Lowe's only had 4x4. He said it would have to be measured and hesitated. He said he would see if he could find a tape measure. He came back and measured and said 4.25x4.25 and that was custom. He said I would have to buy a box but wasn't positive he knew how many tiles that was. He did a bunch of stuff on a calculator until he quoted me 100 tiles for $62. I needed 14 so I told him I would check back after searching. He told me he had the same problem when he did his bathroom. He said okay and maybe I would find an open box somewhere. I walked into Home Depot and 4.25x4.25 is a standard size. I bought 14 tiles for $2.46. I'm not sure what to say about that. I will let you come up with your own conclusions.

I have called repeatedly,  people have been rude, hung up on, talked down, and still no progress!!

name: Nina Propst
text: We are very satisfied with our new carpet and with the service we received.  We recommend checking them out for all of your flooring and countertops first...it will save you lots of time and stress!  Special thanks to Don Williams.  We will be back.

name: Mendy Nilsson
text: Shannon Williams is fantastic. He listened to my needs and showed me lots of options giving the pros and cons of each type of floor. That allowed me to choose the best floor for my needs and WOW I'm so thrilled with my luxury vinyl plank flooring. So beautiful and so easy to clean it makes cleaning house fun. Thank you Shannon and American!!

name: LeBarbara Stinson
text: I had the opportunity to have my Luxury Vinyl Plank floors installed by Mr. Glenn Smith. He had his team members with him. They were the kindest men. They worked hard and didn't half step on anything! They are funny and welcoming. I would recommend them anytime. I thoroughly enjoyed them. They were professional and operated on total and complete excellence!

resp.text: Thank you, LeBarbara!! We will let Glenn know he did a great job. We appreciate your business!

name: Susan Allen
text:
Very informative, professional, and helpful!

Thanks Don Williams.

name: Lisa McGhee
text: I want to say that I won a contest with American Carpets. My prize was 250$ off any area rug in the show room. I went in yesterday to pick out my rug, and was greeted by the owner Mr. Don.. I never expected to have the experience I had with the owner and or any of the showroom employee's they were all so nice and helpful. The owner was there to help me the whole time and made it very memorable he is a very great guy.. I would never hesitate about sending someone in to get any flooring these people treated me with the up most respect and dignity as if I was a paying customer and I'll never forget that... Thanks again to all the people at American Carpets.. y'all are the best... Thanks again Mr. Don glad to have met you...

resp.text: Thank you, Lisa! It was our pleasure!

name: Mr. Curtis
text:
In the past I've remodeled homes for a living, but was never in the position to actually come out of pocket and select carpets, etc.
It turns out making the right choice is lots harder than you think! With the fierce competition now days, it's easy to be told what you want to hear, given prices that you can't judge properly, and ultimately, run around in circles ending with products that are NOT to your satisfaction.
These issues do not arise with American Flooring (the Mobile location is the one I've become acquainted with). The woman who answered my calls, Jessica, was absolutely wonderful to speak with, and the sales person she brought me to the table with, Shane, was both professional, and compassionate.
Suffice it to say I will be returning very soon!

resp.text: Thanks you, Mr. Curtis!! We look forward to hearing from you soon, and in the meantime if you have any questions at all, you know who to call!

name: t h
text: I have recently completed a kitchen renovation and love the outcome. Don helped me select the perfect quartzite countertop for the new island, we purchased luxury vinyl plank for the new floors plus found a beautiful new rug too. Thank you so much for all of your assistance! I am pleased and feel I got a great deal and great service at American Flooring. I would highly recommend them to all of my family and friends.

resp.text: Thank you!! We loved the way your kitchen turned out. Looking forward to doing business with you again in the future!

name: candes ritter
text: I’ve had several rooms carpeted and have always received excellent service, prices and installments.  Absolutely...... this is your first stop if you need flooring!

resp.text: Thank you, Candes! We really appreciate your business!

name: Gary Stiegler
text: My wife came in with a sample and the info for the flooring which had been purchased at AC.  Johnny,  the salesman immediately let her know without looking around that they didn't carry the item.  She proceeded to look around the store on her own, no one asking if she needed help, but after 20 minutes, found the exact piece of flooring!  Found Johnny, and he gave her a price of almost $200 for a 12 piece box of vinyl flooring.  Thanks, but NO THANKS American Carpets!

name: Sally Faucheaux
text: Thank you Jennifer ..... She  was my floor and cabinet specialist..... And thank you for all your expertise,   Also want to thank every one else at  American flooring this is not  the. first time that they have done work for me.  I was very pleased in the past,   It has been some years ago I am changing now because I don't want carpet anymore I want to change to ceramic....great job then, and I am sure they will do a awesome job this time as well, after all   I came back for more ;)

name: Rachel Jenkins
text: Jennifer Vaughan is amazing to work with.   She saw my vision and brought it to life.  She also prepared me for the installation experience by explaining it honestly and in depth.   I will never use anyone else in the future except her.   American Flooring needs to hold on to her.

name: Sharon Thompson
text: I am a mortgage lender in the Mobile and Baldwin county areas and have referred more clients than I can count to the Mobile and Gulf Shores locations over the years. Whatever your home needs may be, American Flooring is well rounded with an amazing selection of products, and a wonderful team of sales reps and installers. Be sure you follow them on Facebook, they do lots of giveaways and sales you don't want to miss! If you want to call before you go in and actually schedule ahead, ask for Jessica and she'll make sure someone is there to greet you and meet whatever needs you have!

name: Jessica Bates
text: I'm only giving one star because the material itself was great. The guy that did our template for our countertops measured wrong and only half of my notch was able to be done. The installers flooded my bathroom because the water wasn't off when they took the pipes apart. They knocked several holes in my walls and left without mentioning any of them. After a SIX HOUR install, I still had no water to my sinks and only half of the kitchen done. My stuff wet and laying everywhere and holes in walls in every room they worked in.

resp.text:
Thank you for taking the time to let us know about the situation. We are reaching out to the installation crew and will make this right for you, whatever it may take. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

Update: Thank you for allowing us to fix all of the issues. We appreciate your business!!

name: Leslile Reddick
text: I used American Carpets to install my granite, carpet and laminate flooring in my kitchen.  This was done in August 2013.  My carpet separated between rooms and along the kitchen and living room and nails are sticking up.  My under counter sink is loose.  I have been trying to have this fixed for months now with no resolution at all.  Chris in installation has been out to my house twice to "look" at it with promises of it being fixed.  Nothing has been done.  I feel that the work that was done was unprofessional and cheap.  I spent a lot of money on this and would expect it to last longer than a year and if not, at least for it to be fixed in a timely manner.  I will never refer anybody to American Carpets as my experience has been very dissatisfying.  I have never written a review before, much less a negative one, but I felt I had to because I have been getting the run around for months.

name: Steve Baker
text: Very friendly folks. Not only did I get a great job on my ceramic flooring​, I think that this business has a lot of Christian people and that is why it is doing so good. Chris and his son that laid my flooring did a great job. Shane the salesman also knows his job. A plus to this business.

name: Lacy Hilliard
text: Craig Crawford and his crew did excellent on the installation of vinyl flooring. They were personable, well mannered and addressed my concerns immediately . This is the crew you need for your installation! Showroom time was quick and precise with my needs.

resp.text: Thank you, Lacy! We've let Craig know how great of a job he did. We look forward to doing business with you in the future!

name: Kem Hall
text: I googled wood floorings and came up with this store. For years I thought they only sold carpet.  I found a vast amount of everything needed for a home; granite, cabinets, wood flooring, tile, rugs, vinyl plank, you name it and its here.  This is a ONE STOP SHOP. Employees are welcoming, helpful and knowledgeable to help with everything. They have good deals too.

name: Kyla Gaston
text: I GOT THE OPPORTUNITY TO WORK WITH JENNIFER V. AND JAN R.  - OH MY GOODNESS THEY ARE A TERRIFIC TEAM. I HAD AN ISSUE WITH MY FLOOR WHEN MY HOME WAS BUILT DUE TO THE WRONG DOOR BEING PLACED IN THE HOME, MY WOOD FLOORING HAD TO COME UP DUE TO WATER DAMAGE AND I HAD TO REPLACE IT WITH ANOTHER PRODUCT. JENNIFER AND JAN SAW HOW UPSET I WAS AND WAS ABLE TO MAKE FEEL BETTER AND REASSURED ME THE SECTION OF MY FLOOR WOULD LOOK FABULOUS. I AM SO HAPPY WITH THE TILE AND MOSIAC ACCENT TILE FOR THE FLOOR AREA, IT LOOKS LIKE THE HOME WAS ORGINALLY BUILT THAT WAY. I CAN NOT SAY ENOUGH FOR JENNIFER AND JAN TWO WONDERFUL LADIES AND THEY ARE GREAT AT THEIR JOBS.

resp.text: Thank you for your business, Kyla!!

name: Ethel Moore
text: My husband and I received a warm welcome upon entering the storefront and we were treated wonderfully! I explained to Shannon,  our sales rep,  what I wanted and he took us right to it!  It felt as if we were old friends.  I was never pressured to purchase anything which is a PLUS.  I cannot count the many times that I left a place due to the pressure to buy something that I'm really not looking for.  We also met the 'big man in charge' -as I affectionately refer to him.  You know,  the 'open 8 to 8 so don't be late' gentleman.  Lol.  Very warm and professional.  The carpet they installed looks AMAZING!  It's exactly what I wanted at the price I wanted! I will DEFINITELY recommend American Flooring and Cabinets. Ask for Shannon,  HE IS A GEM!

name: Lynn Zimmerman
text: We had Johnny also five years ago and are sorry we went there. We asked for the best pad that they had and also wanted quality carpet and were told that we had ordered it. Now we have "humps" in our carpet from stretching and we have to replace it soon. They tiled our foyer, hall and kitchen and while we love the tile they are uneven and chipped. Afterwards they fixed some but in order to make it right they would have had to redo most of it.  For $6,000+ we just expected better.  Make sure that you know what you are getting is right and the quality that you expect. We went to the Mobile store to have our work done.

name: AllDone3
text:
Not only did they sell me on buying material from them instead of the competitors in the are, they educated me on WHY was more durable or waterproof than another and explained the difference in the products that I was interested in.

"People buy from people, not companies."

These people took fantastic care of me and my home.

resp.text: Thank you, Aldon! We look forward to doing more business with you in the future!

name: Katie Azevedo
text: We love our new carpet! The prices were reasonable and everything was done quickly and professionally.

name: Mallory Howard
text: So, my impression was great when I left the store but quickly changed. Salesmen were very helpful. Acted eager to help us get our remodel done. They showed me a countertop that they had in stock. It was ok, but not exactly when I was looking for but they insisted it looked great. I again, said no, I’ll keep looking. Kept looking and found the one, the countertop that would look the best. Left the store with the salesman’s card to call back with measurements. My husband called them 2 hours later to get a quote. Salesman tried selling him the countertop they had in stock but was not what I looking for. My husband told him no, she wants the other. He quoted him a price. Then called back and DOUBLED the the first quote because they’d have to order it. Seems they were eager to help sell what they had in stock, but be darned to sell what they’d have to order. We won’t be making a purchase from this store. Our business will go else where.

name: Scotti Bee
text: Great place. Everyone I worked with was fantastic. Great attitudes, wonderful customer service.

name: Apple Henderson
text: Well..well well, what can I say??  I sought help and met a man named Johnny at American.  We were needing granite and flooring.  He showed us a couple of choices and suggested we go to the warehouse in Loxley to pick granite and took our info and said  let him know what we decide on and we'll get a quote.  Needless to say he lost our info and forgot who we were.  We contacted him and reminded him of the quote.  He was to get with us on several occasions and did not!!  The lady who answered my call was aware of my frustration and got a owner/manager to take my call.  Got another we'll get you the answer and call you spill again.  We are not from here and should have believed reviews...SOOOO grateful to have been referred to HARD ROCK GRANITE....they are professional, personable,  thorough, quick and they treat you like family. If quality everything choose HARD ROCK they will be honest and get you a better deal too!!!!!

resp.text:
April,

I am so sorry to hear about your unfortunate experience. We really appreciate your feedback, and hope that in the future you give us the chance to make it right.

name: Logan Crouch
text:
I came in with a friend and Johnny Marino was our salesmen. I have never had a worse experience. He was introduced to us as 'the man who knew it best' and that he had 'been in the business for 43 years'. However, he was not polite, seemed to talk over us as we explained our needs, treated us as if we had no idea what we wanted, and overall was completely unprofessional: not only to us, but for other customers who were in the store. We were shown one product, and after the purchase, were shown a completely different colored product; then were argued to repeatedly that it was the light causing the color difference.

The business had a wide selection of products, and I'm sure with another salesman we would have had a better experience. But this particular transaction just left a bad taste in my mouth.

name: Joshua Carper
text: Dont shop here they are crooks!

name: Victoria Wilson
text: Advertised "Open 8 to 8". Arrived about 5:40 unaware of new store hours. Came to buy flooring for 3 rooms. Salesman took me to the back to look at sheet vinyl rolls and remnants. Told me to browse while he figured out how much I needed from the measurements that I provided. I thought he was taking a little too long. Went to look for him and discovered that everyone had left and locked the doors. That's when I saw a sheet of white paper on the front door with new store hours 8-6. I HAD A PANIC ATTACK! Called my sister. She called Mobile Police Dept. MPD came. A woman in another vehicle then arrived and told him how to get me out. I left a note on the salesman's desk with my name and phone number and what had happened. I picked up my floor plan and measurements and left. NO ONE EVEN CALLED TO APOLOGIZE.

name: Michael A
text: Service was excellent. Shane Gros was very helpful. Definitely the place to shop. Can't go wrong. Thank you Shane for all your help!

name: Todd Burley
text: Visited this place on April 2nd to shop for new carpeting for our new house in Semmes. After we shopped around at several stores we found this place the most useful because of their helpful staff, affordable prices and financing. We ended up buying 1500 sq ft of carpet and had it installed last week, my wife loves the carpet and I love being able to get out of bed barefoot. We are very happy with American Flooring and would recommend them to anyone who needs a good deal on carpet

name: Cyndi Booth
text: I love, love, love my new kitchen granite countertops. They look great with the new cabinets recently installed by American Flooring, Cabinets , and Granite . I had the tile floors installed in a few rooms about 6 months ago. Everything is coming together and looking beautiful! Next is the bathroom shower and countertops and a bedroom needs hardwood flooring and........American Flooring, Cabinets, & Granite "Your One Stop Shop" for all of your remodeling needs!

name: John rohman
text: They have a beautiful showroom and staff was very helpful it was a great experience no stress,ill be back

resp.text: Thanks, John! We are looking forward to it!

name: Danny Woodard
text: Attended the event they had last week where they said they were giving away prizes. I was told by a young lady there the drawings wouldn't be until late that evening and that I had to buy something to get a ticket. I then decided to buy a bottle of cleaner and was told that wasn't enough value for a ticket into the drawing. Clearly a bait and switch tactic to get people in their expensive store. Buyers Beware!

resp.text: No purchase was necessary to enter the contest or win. In fact, 4 out of 5 of our big prize winners didn't shop with us that day. We did not find this customer in our database of transactions that day. We appreciate all of our customers who came in for our 45th anniversary customer appreciation day event and hope to continue being your one stop shop!

name: Diane james
text: LOVE my new rugs! Will definitely be doing business with y'all in the future!

resp.text: Looking forward to it! Thanks!

name: Norma Beachman
text:
We got everything we asked for .the company is number 5 you
And their employment Ronald STEGMEIER is So Good At his Job
iWould Give Him A 10
He made Sure the Job was done Right And worked untill it was Finished
On A Saturday we would Recommend your Company and  Employee
Ronald STEGMEIER to anyone.
Robert and Norma BEACHMAN

resp.text: Thank you, Norma!! We appreciate your business and I believe you meant Roland? We will let Roland know of his stellar job!

name: val hansen
text: When you place an order for 14 boxes for laminate flooring and get 3 boxes you think maybe it was just 1 mistake.  When you also place an order for ceramic tile for the facing of your fireplace at the same time you ordered the laminate flooring and you get 3/4 of it you start to wonder about this store that's been in business for so long. When you place an order for 3 boxes of ceramic tile for the inside of your fireplace at that very same time and you get 1 box because they FORGOT to order 3 and  you have PAID for it ALL!!!!  I am wondering WTH is THEIR problem!!!!  I took back the 1 box of ceramic tile since I didn't like it,  it didn't match, got a refund, pkd up the 3 boxes of flooring and tried to give me the other 2 boxes of ceramic tile I had gotten a refund on?????  Yes, I know had for me to believe too!!  Finally got all of my flooring. Had to reorder more fireplace facing tiles, pd for it, was told it was ordered as I was in the store and would be in that Friday, it came in the next Tuesday!!!! Found out it was NOT ordered until the day AFTER I ordered it!!!!  BTW, I finally went to LOWES, and got the rest of the ceramic tile I needed for the inside of my fireplace that they had IN STOCK!!  All this going on as my contractor was doing what he could with what we had!!!  Needless to say HE was not very happy and will be writing a review also on this store.  I live 18 miles 1 way from this Mobile store.  I made a trip 6 days in a row.  My sales person was Shane Williams.  I would NEVER recommend this store to anyone and will tell everyone I know of my experience.

name: J H
text: Misleading sales. If they make a mistake you are stuck with it...no returns! I tell everyone not to shop here. Salesman called me "sweetie" when he refused to correct his mistake..how demeaning. Similar incident with an acquaintance of mine, so must not be a rare occurrence.

name: Leigh Stewart
text: Don has always help us in anyway that he can.  If I ever had a problem,  Don take care of it himself. We have been with him for many, many years.

name: Hannah Saenz
text: This is most definitely a one stop shop, bought my counter tops, cabinets and flooring here. The prices were very affordable and I highly recommend this place to everyone!

name: Jonathan Cunningham
text: Good place friendly service

name: Jason Pyon
text: Great people, great floors!

resp.text: Thank you, Jason!

name: jessie james
text: Awesome Customer Service!!!!!!

name: Tiffany Middleton
text: Great customer service

resp.text: Thank you, Tiffany. We appreciate your business!

name: Kyle Patterson
text: Very good experience

resp.text: Thanks, Kyle! Who was your sales rep?

name: Michael Farrier
text: Helpful

resp.text: Thank you, Michael!

name: Joshua Southard
text: They are very nice and extremely helpful to the extent of looking at pictures of the wall color and getting a good match for the floor and not clash. They have everything you need to get a floor done with real hardwood, laminate hardwood, vinyl and tile carpets and rugs. If u can walk on it THEY will have it. I'm still waiting on the free home estimate and I will update this post after with pictures.

name: Traci Reed
text: What a wonderful experience today at this establishment working with Kim! It was so refreshing to work with her and Dinah!! And we got Everything we wanted and needed. We love All we picked out!! Can’t wait to see it all in our New Forever Home!!!!

name: Mike Measels
text: Shane and David did great. They were committed to and take great pride in their job. They were punctual every day and if they were going to be a little late would notify us. They have the process of refinishing floors down to a science and a lot of hard work.  They were also courteous and friendly.  We highly recommend them.

name: Merri Bass
text: Staff is the best!! Helpful and very knowledgeable about all things flooring.

name: Steven Stovall
text: Very nice and willing to answer all your questions Good people

name: Jacques Cockrell
text: Great experience. Very professional and knowledgeable. Nice selections and great attitudes.

name: Balinda Adams
text: This place has just the right amount of a variety of flooring without making you overwhelmed. The young guy at the desk was very nice and attentive to us when we came in. Shane went out of his way to make sure my parents found everything they were looking for. He even gave them a sample of wood to take home to see if it matched the staircase. He also gave them a quote that was much cheaper than the other flooring store we had went to. He was honest and very upfront. If you go by, ask for Shane and he will take great care of you and even help with design questions.

name: Adam Baker
text: We were pleasantly surprised when we walked in the door! Not only did everyone greet us but several were busy with other customers yet they made sure we were taken care of. We told Vicki what we wanted and she read my mind and presented several options. We will not only mention them to our friends we will shop with them again very soon. Thank you for your hospitality and commitment to making sure we got what we wanted, in the budget we had to work with and all installed in a timely manner.

name: T W
text: Update to a review with only 1 star rating several months ago from De W. As the customer who wrote it, we made an effort to update the rating but could not seem to do so. However, please know that all concerns with the installer were addressed and done so professionally. In reality the concern was simply a breakdown in communication. No one is perfect and they did what was right and corrected our concerns. Ryan was excellent and prides himself on taking care of the customer. Please omit the rating from your decision process on where to buy your flooring. They truly deserve a full 5 star rating.

name: Vicky Brown
text:
Very Helpful and Knowledgeable Staff.
Great Selection to choose from... well
laid out showroom.  I would Recommend
to others.

name: Judy Croft
text: Our overall experience was outstanding, from the selection to the service. Thank you for your design advice, it really helped us make the right selection for our project. I would recommend to everyone. Thank you.

name: De W.
text:
They promise you ethical treatment, integrity & flawless service. Don't believe it.
Once carpet was selected - salesman assured quality professional installers in a timely manner.
The installer arrived late; talking highly of himself and did not reply or respond when asked questions. Once carpet installed, we inspected job. Carpet had high strips where Sean's were like the carpet was doubled at the seam. I pointed it out to installer (Terry), and he pulled on it saying it won't come loose. I said I wasn't worried about it coming loose but the seam was obviously thick.
He ignored my concern. A week later I called back and spoke to sales person who came our days later to look at it. It took another week to get a call back where salesman asked for a convenient time for installer to come back. I gave him 2-days and timetable around my work schedule. Salesman said he would call installer and get back with me on day & time. I was assured installer would be back to repair on one of the days I provided but he would call back to confirm.
On the day installer was suppose to be here for repair I received a call from installer saying he was calling to set up the appointment. What?! You were were suppose to be here....
I called the store and I got excuses from the lady sales person saying the installer was trying to call me.
Don't bother calling these people..they don't know what they're doing and they are not customer service conscious. I won't be using them again.

name: J Bin8148
text: Price I was quoted for materials changed drastically after work was done. I was told those were the in stock prices. Had no choice but to pay I was never contacted saying the quote was going to be different. Stay away

name: Catrina J
text:
No customer service. My husband and I visit the store this morning looking to purchase some flooring. When we entered, no one greeted us or said one word to us while we were there. We looked around and nothing. Waited near the desk, nothing. We left! If you are with a customer or busy, all it takes is 10 seconds to say "Hello! welcome! We will be with you shortly"
We spent our money elsewhere.

name: Lillian Black
text: Very happy with experience from sales to fantastic installers. Price exactly what estimate was.

name: Mark G.
text: We bought our flooring from Alabama Custom Flooring  and Design and couldn't ask for a better experience.  The service was beyond my expectations.  I highly recommend them for all you flooring needs.

name: Jared Toone
text: Great selection and pricing. Order came in quickly and all went well.

name: michael joseph
text: easy experience. helpful/knowledgeable sales person

name: Michelle Hockersmith
text: Thank you to Ryan for the excellent service.   I highly recommend Alabama Custom Flooring & Design for all your flooring needs.

name: Stan D
text: They quote cheap prices by the foot, and then over measure by nearly 20%...be careful with this place.

name: Dana Lee
text: Great place to find flooring.

name: Eugene Jackson
text: I work here, beautiful  cabinets,  will do a great job. If you come to us give them my name. Eugene Jackson as your referral

name: Evan Henegar
text: Installed incorrect and broken cabinets. When trying to get warranty work on defects due to having no quality control it took months for them to schedule. When first contacted about having them come and fix issue they didn’t return my call for over a month. Very poor work and service I would not recommend using. Please avoid!

name: Cethy “C Lee” Lee
text: Alabama Cabinet Company is amazing! I love my new kitchen. Jacob Pollard was super helpful when I was choosing my cabinet style, color, hardware, and countertops. And all of the employees who came to measure and install the new cabinets were friendly, courteous, and professional. I highly recommend this company!

resp.text: Thank you for the review.  We hope you enjoy your new kitchens and bathroom!  The project is beautiful!

name: Lindsey Lee
text: I had a wonderful experience with Alabama Cabinet Company. The cabinets are high quality and look great. The staff is wonderful to assist with design questions. They were top notch all the way through the design, ordering, and installation process. I highly recommend using this company for a new build or remodel project. I am so pleased with these cabinets from both a functionality perspective. Thank you, Jacob, Steve and the rest of the team for making this such a great experience for us. We love our new kitchen!

resp.text: Mrs. Lee.  We appreciate your business and are thankful that you chose our company to help with your project.  Thank you!

name: Ronnie Adkins
text: Man these folks and very professional at what they do. They are real professional and easy to talk too. I give them 5 stars . God bless this place. 🙏

name: Leslie Price
text: As a project manager, I have worked with this company on several large projects and we have been so pleased with the communication, scheduling, and time management of each project. Great cabinet options to choose from, and honest feedback on what would be best to use. I would (and DO!) recommend Alabama Cabinet to anyone looking for cabinets.

name: Kasey Fain
text: DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!! We are going on FIVE MONTHS and our project still isn’t complete. My husband and I built our home and our entire project was held up for several weeks because of cabinets. Communication is awful. The guy we have been dealing with takes days if not weeks to respond to any emails or phone calls. The wrong color was ordered for our pulls even though we confirmed THREE times on what colors we wanted. And on top of that they didn’t even order the entire amount of pulls we needed so we still have cabinets with no pulls. We have mismatched pulls in our master bathroom because, again, they failed to order the correct color or number of pulls. But my biggest complaint is that they installed our cabinets for the wrong size oven so we then had to return the oven we already had ready to be installed and buy a bigger one which ended up costing us $5,000 to fix their mistake. We have a vanity cabinet in our master bath that is the WRONG COLOR and instead of fixing it themselves they dropped off a can of spray paint for us to fix it. The fact that they are willing to let a customer fix their mistake is beyond me. We even recommended this company to other people (before all of the mistakes) and after talking to our friends we find out that their cabinets were messed up as well! I’ve never had such terrible customer service in all of my life.

name: Jennifer van Arcken
text: Very good prices. Not very convenient location and the showroom is jumbled and not well organized. Products are good and service is good.

name: John Gill
text: Very good to work with during design and installation. the quality of cabinet is much better than big box home improvement stores at a competitive price. Of the subs used for my new house they were one of the best.

resp.text: Mr. Gill, we appreciate your business and Review of our company. Thank you!

name: Deb Kornegay
text: Alabama Cabinets did a fabulous job helping us upgrade our 40 year old kitchen.  All of the workmen were a delight to have in our home.  You will not go wrong if you chose this company!

resp.text: Thank you for the review!  We enjoyed working on this unique project in such a beautiful setting.

name: Sherrie Wilson
text: Janice was the best. She worked very hard for us. I will do business with her again.

name: Cari Callison
text: We had a great overall experience with the design and install on our beautiful custom kitchen and bathroom cabinets. Chris was very responsive and attentive to our requests and questions. 100% recommend.

resp.text: Mr. Callison.  Thank you for the kind review.  We are glad you enjoyed the experience and we are grateful for your business.

name: Anne Carlton Reebals
text: Alabama Cabinet Co. made our kitchen renovation easier than we could have imagined. Jacob was incredibly helpful, and he was patient as we went back and forth on decisions. We are extremely pleased with how everything turned out! The cabinets are beautiful and of the highest quality! I will recommend these guys to everyone I know pursuing home reno projects. Thank you, thank you for being wonderful to work with and delivering beautiful products for our kitchen.

resp.text: Mrs. Reebals, thank you very much for the review.  Your carport to kitchen conversion was a great project to be a part of.  We appreciate your business!

name: Ty Lowe

name: Amanda Klein
text: My husband and I renovated our kitchen this fall and have nothing but GREAT things to say about Jacob and Alabama Cabinet Company. We purchased a fixer-upper 7 years ago, and have been slowly renovating it since, and from pricing/communication/professionalism/quality Alabama Cabinet Co. has been the *best* vendor we have worked with throughout our entire home renovation. My husband and I both have demanding jobs where scheduling is often somewhat complicated, and Jacob was so great with communication/scheduling, their contractors were ALWAYS on time and there when they said they would be. They made the entire process very easy. The finished product is absolutely beautiful. We are so thankful to have worked with Jacob and ACC for our kitchen renovation, and will be using them again in the future. If you are looking for cabinets/countertops, we wholeheartedly recommend Alabama Cabinet Co.

resp.text: Amanda.  Thank you for the kind words.  We hope you are enjoying your kitchen!  We appreciate your business!!!

text: Premier service - they recently went out of their way to help ship an order when it did not arrive on time and helped to save our project timeline. Great company, I highly recommend you giving then a call or stopping by and asking for Allan.

text: This place is awesome they have a huge show room with a very wide variety of selections. The Price is is wonderful, and Aly is an Amazing sales lady she has more knowledge of products, installation techniques, and designs than most flooring contractors I have met. be sure and go by and visit ProSource you'll be impressed like we were. PS I'm a contractor not a store employee.

name: Lucas Gambino
text: We hired this company to remodel our kitchen. We did not have much knowledge about these types of projects, so we really needed someone who could provide us with insight and direction. This company was everything we could have asked for. They provided a step-by-step instructions on how to think about our remodel project, and offered continuous support and great ideas along the way. We never felt like we were asking too many questions. They were extremely easy to work with. We receive personal attention from the owner and his wife. And even better than the service perhaps was the great price.  We receive tremendous value and would hire them over and over again. After having looked around before hiring them, I feel confident that there is no other kitchen remodel company in the state that is even close on service, price or quality.

name: Aaron Waters
text: I have purchased appliances from European Kitchens of Alabama twice and would not hesitate to purchase again.  Loay and May are tremendous to deal with and have always put our needs above theirs.  I cannot say enough good things about them.

name: Misty Fontenot
text: We love Loay and his amazing showroom and products. When we renovated a historic home in Highland Park, we went to visit him for our entire suite of kitchen appliances. I found the stove of my dreams (a Bertazzoni) that he had in the back and gave us an amazing deal on it - and on everything. My spouse is an Architect and works with him a lot because he’s awesome and so is the business!

BUT! If you want builders grade, or really cool stuff at great low prices.... then they are well worth a visit! Ober 50,000 sample in a gorgous well lit showroom.

BEST flooring, plumbing and cabinet showroom I have ever seen.

resp.text: Thank you, David. The lumber market is challenging right now. We do our best to keep our prices competitive, our product in stock and our service levels high. Thank you for your kind words. We appreciate your review and your business.

name: William Bowden Jr
text: Always a wonderful experience with this Company. Lowest prices, always stocked, great customer service.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review. It's definitely been a challenging year for lumberyards (and our customers)! We appreciate your kind words and your business. Please let us know if there's anything we can do to service you even better.

name: Wood Kirk Works
text: Even though the staff seemed knowledgeable about the products offered here, the vibe of this business is pretentious to say the least. I came in with my girlfriend and her son. We came within 6 ft of several middle-aged employees and weren't greeted once. I had to approach the counter and ask for what I needed (which they didn't have) then I was left to my own devices finding anything else useful in the store. This could have been tolerable if it weren't for the same employees greeting other customers with warm, inviting hellos and good wishes.

resp.text: We apologize that you did not feel seen and appreciated in our store. We pride ourselves on customer service, whether its to contractors who come in every day or first time shoppers. We are fully open to the public and value our customers equally. We failed to demonstrate that. We hope you'll give us another opportunity to earn your business.

name: Jabaria Dent
text: Good customer service. And their wood prices beat Lowe's

resp.text: Thank you for this review. We hope this helps new customers know that, while we are not a global corporation like Lowe's, our prices are  very often lower than the big box stores.

name: A T
text: I ordered fence pickets from them, paid over phone, and had delivered a week later no problem. I call back a few days later to ask if I can get a few more and am told they haven't had any in weeks and I must be confused about who I got them from. I call back the next day and am told there's 30 left but they don't take payments over the phone. It sounds to me like the employees each have their own rules they go by 🙄

resp.text: Hi. We apologize for our poor communication. We should have done a better job explaining the fence board situation. The market for fence boards is extremely turbulent right now. We are accustomed to having a ready supply in stock and ordinarily we would be happy to take an order over the phone and hold the inventory. However, because fence boards are in such high demand and we haven't been able to source them with the dependability of the pre-COVID days, we are discouraging our staff from reserving them, because the last thing we want is a customer to pay for a product, expect it, and we not have it in stock when they are ready for delivery.

name: Andrew O'Dell
text: Good lumber at a good price, knowledgeable and very helpful staff.

name: Manuela Smith
text: Was disappointed by employees knowledge and selling me the wrong tool to fit the screws I bought there.

resp.text: Hi Manuela. We remember you coming in yesterday. We apologize for disappointing you. It's often difficult to discern the size of a screw or bolt from a cell phone image. We suggested a product that would work on a range of bolt sizes, but unfortunately we didn't guess right. Thank you for your business and again we are sorry we weren't able to help you select the right product the first time.

name: Ray Keene
text: Great customer service.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words, Mr. Keene. We appreciate your business.

name: Priscilla Young
text: Friendly environment, eager to assist, fast service.

name: Michelle Morgan
text:
We have been remodeling our home and I have been looking for a front door for about 2 months now with no luck and very little enthusiasm to sell me a door.  I happen to stumble across Mobile Lumber and Yvette was a breath of fresh air when it came to picking out the perfect front door.  She was very knowledgeable, nice, fast and her follow through was great.  Within 24 hours she had my pricing and order placed for me, even saved me a trip back to West Mobile by handling everything over the phone.  Excellent customer service, I only wish we would had checked Mobile Lumber out at the beginning of our remodel adventure.

Thanks so much Yvette,

Michelle Morgan

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words and for taking the time to give us this review. We appreciate it and so does Yvette. If there's anything else we can help you with in the future, please let us know.

name: Heather w
text: Went there a couple of Saturdays ago to look at front doors. Complete waste of time. We were not greeted when walking in, no one came over to assist us, or acknowledged us when we left. Not much selection out on the floor for what we were looking for and no customer service was offered.

resp.text: Hi Heather. We pride ourselves on our customer service, which is one factor that differentiates us from the big box stores. We failed to provide that experience to you and we apologize. Our team is very knowledgeable in exterior door options and we regret that we aren't able to help you select the perfect door for your home. We appreciate you coming in and hope you'll give us another chance.

name: 2SSRS 5th Gen
text: Prices are kinda high. But they also aren't MASKHOLES.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. We agree, lumber prices are on the high side right now, but that's across the industry. Lumber is a commodity and prices fluctuate daily (sometimes hourly) depending on the market. We value our reputation for pricing our building materials extremely competitively. It's part of what has kept us around since 1975.

name: OBrien Holcombe
text: This place has been here for decades and at least 4 of those decades I have used them for many project needs. Good folks, wonderful environment and the men in the yard do not get enough praise. So here is to you gentlemen for doing such an outstanding job day in and day out.

resp.text: Brien, we certainly appreciate your support and patronage over the past 4 decades! We will pass this praise along to our guys in the yard. If we can do anything to make your experience even better, please don't hesitate to let us know.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. Some days are busier than others, but we understand the value of our customers' time and try to get you what you need efficiently so you can keep your jobs moving.

name: Ronnie Cliburn
text: The folks there are really friendly and helpful. They don't have the amount of different stuff the Lowe's and home Depot have, but I would rather go there and check first for what I need.

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Ronnie. Let us know what you're looking for and we'll always be happy to help you find it, even if it's through another vendor, or we can often order it from our warehouse. See you soon!

name: Detroit Q
text: Some of the worst customer service I have ever experienced. I had never been to this place so I was unsure if customers were allowed to walk through the warehouse. Naturally I ask the clerk at the desk or at least tried to ask and when I say this guy gave the impression that he us too busy to deal with me. The guy wouldn't even stop typing or even give me the common decency of looking at me when he responded. At first I was thinking maybe I was asking to much due to me being a vet and being so use to people at least looking at you to acknowledge your existence but when he proceeded to continue typing and responding with very short answers I knew then it wasn't me. Everyone is entitled to a bad day and I get that but you work in the customer service industry for God sakes. A little hospitality would go a long way. I guess it's on to the next lumber yard.

name: Paul Miller
text: I shopped around and ended up doing my business here.  Well priced and very helpful

name: Eric Linsley
text: Great service. Best trim moulding prices in town!

name: Mark James
text: Good place to get all your buildings needs

name: Katherine Winslow Austill
text:
The items I purchased were not available & what was available was not 1st quality.

None of the items offered for pick-up were straight & defect free.

I had to be very firm in my demand for a full refund.

The experience took over 1.5 hours to:
1) place the order
2) have the order hand written
3) pay for the order
4) drive around to pick up the order
5) walk inside and inform of the poor quality and insufficient quantity
6) walk back out to pick up to show inside sales the poor quality and insufficient quantity
7) walk back inside to ask - then demand a refund
8) wait while the entire order was again hand written and wait for my refund

A complete waste of time.
1.5 hours to accomplish nothing.

resp.text: Hi Katherine. We hate hearing that you had such a bad experience at our store! We are trying to track down your transaction to figure out what happened so it won't happen in the future. Providing an excellent customer service experience is very important to us! Would you be willing to talk to our store manager Lee to help us understand what happened? You can reach him at 661-8000. Again, we are sorry for any inconvenience we caused you.

text: Don't go anywhere else to pay high dollar for bad wood.  Come to Mobile Lumber and get the good stuff from people who care.

resp.text: Thank you for noticing!  We've implemented some new practices in our yard to increase efficiencies for our customers. Our goal is to be always improving.

name: Deirdre Taylor
text: I only go to home Depot if Lowe's doesn't have what I need, and that's rare. I always have a problem picking up orders. You can't just call in to have it brought to you by curbside because they claim to be too busy to get your information. When you go in, if the order is not in that little closet behind them, they'll just tell you it's not there rather than to go to the back and get it. I order a lot and never have a problem with Lowe's. It took an act of congress to finally get my complete order from Home Depot. One young lady, Kia went out of her way to help me and it wasn't even her department. Thanks to her I have everything. I only shop here when I absolutely have no choice.

name: Silvery Nova
text: The first problem is the delivery service company that Home Depot uses for direct deliveries,Central Transport. My 1st initial delivery date changed three time before it was actually attempted to be delivered on March 3rd. On March 3rd the shipment came on a long bed truck with a pallet dolly. My shipment is a pallet of 33 boxes of porcelain tile., plus 7 additional boxes they put on the same pallet. The right side of the pallet was coming apart due to the immense weight of the tile . The driver could not move the pallet down the truck. He was not going to be able to pull it up the small slope on my driveway. What on earth were they even thinking?They needed a fork lift. I called Home Depot and they got the Transport company on the line while I was on hold. I ended up being told the transport company needed to take care of this and they would contact me in 24 to 48 hours. Which they never did. I had to call them. On 3/5 Friday I called central transport and they told me the shipment would be delivered on Monday between 11 and 12. They never showed. I checked the shipment tracking and found that they changed it to Tuesday 3/9! I got no call, text, or phone call.So Tuesday 3/9 I message them to find out eta. They said the drivers hadn't left yet and to keep checking they will update me. That never happened. So I wait and wait and I get a call from Home Depot letting me know the tile has arrived at THE STORE. I was never told anything about this.They will be delivering the tile on Monday 3/15....

I went in the garden center and told girl at registry, that  I wanted 2 medium bags of Miracle-Gro potting soil, and help getting it n putting it in car.  No help came, then she told me go in back pick it up.  Finally realized she charged me for garden soil, I ask her to give me potting soil and charge me for the difference.  She said she couldn't, I had go customer service.  I told her I wasn't able, that why I parked out in front garden center and ask for help.  I told her I would eat the loss and never come there again.

I don't like be hard get long with, but it was her mistake, why should I have go customer service, when I have trouble walking that distance.  I will use Lowes from now on.

I'm a 100% Service Connected Disable Veteran.

It’s been SUNNY all day. No bad weather AT ALL. Now the delivery date has been moved to May 12th. I will be giving birth in May so that’s really annoying 🙄 I ordered my washer and dryer on MARCH 3RD!!!  I hope the warehouse manager makes this right.

name: Jessie
text: Went to buy an appliance that I saw online. Called the this particular store literally on my way over there. Young lady told me that indeed they had the sale item which I was inquiring about. I get to the store and spoke with someone worker in appliances I ask him again to verify of what I wanted. He walks back and confirms my injury. Rung me up just to realize he mentioned through conversation of the appliance he thought I was asking of. Which I corrected him and pointed out and literally touched again the same appliances that I wanted. Apparently some way some how after all this confusion. They magically had sold out. So my thinking leads me to believe the person I spoke to on the phone didn't bother to check or maybe something with system either way wasted my time and here's the kicker the way the guy tried to put it was like I could go to another home depot after I already paid. Luckily my bank released this debit transaction. Poor poor salesmanship and somewhere along the line communication is lacking. I hope I can revisit this location in the future without this issue.

name: Robyn Curry
text:
**EDIT**
Since the freezer mishap below the management staff (namely Dave) has gone above and beyond to make things right by me. I feel like The Home Depot has redeemed themselves and they have earned my business once again.

I ordered an upright freezer to be delivered to my home. I missed three days of work for no-show deliveries and countless hours on the phone trying to get a freezer delivered and all I got in return was excuses and finger pointing. I had three managers from the West Mobile location involved in this situation (Dave, Cameron, and Jonathan) as well as the customer service help line. They were all aware of the fiasco that had occurred with this delivery yet when I asked what could be done no solution was offered. After a month of no freezer from the Home Depot I cancelled the order and bought one from Lowe’s. I had it the very next day. The Home Depot was always my go-to home improvement store but in light of the lack of customer service in this particular situation I think I’ll reconsider that.

name: Shaun Steffensen
text:
If you order appliances from somewhere, do yourself a favor and not order from Home Depot. First, the people who are selling the appliances do not know much about them. I was told that for installation of my microwave, I needed an outlet in the wall that it was being installed on. Great. I'm good. WRONG!!! The outlet had to be above the microwave.... Something that would have been nice to know, but they could not communicate that properly.
Then, the delivery/installation people had no idea what they were doing. They were more of a delivery company, not an installation professional. They could not install my gas range. They damaged my microwave. So, really, they weren't even a good delivery company. Home Depot just subs out delivery to the cheapest company....and you can see the quality when your damaged items arrive!
And I pray for you if you have ANY problems with your delivery or installation!!!
Count on a couple of things: 1) You will spend hours on the phone getting to talk to the right person. Once you think that you have the right person, they will tell you they have to check on something and they will have to call you back. OR, the right person is "on lunch" and they will call you back. After giving them ample time for "lunch" (3 hours) when you call them back, you will be told that they were "off today" but they will return your call in the morning.
Basically, it's a game of ping-pong and it takes days to get simple questions answered because, obviously, no one who works there wants to actually do anything.
I can't believe I dropped over $7K in there and they can't even answer a simple question!!!!
Buyer beware!!! Shop at Lowe's!!!

name: Lacey Paquin
text: I ordered $1,600 worth of appliances on black Friday to furnish my investment property. I scheduled them to be delivered on Friday, 12/22, and I was told the delivery time frame would be from 2pm-6pm. I planned accordingly and the my appliances were never delivered! No CALL or anything. It took me 4 different phone calls to reach an actual person. The delivery people could not be reached. I waited at the property until 10pm. I went to the store the next day and spoke with the manager, and apparently I was the 3rd customer complaining of no delivery and no notification. The store could not reach the delivery service because they were closed, and would not re-open again until that Tuesday after Christmas. I was told they "might" start calling customers then to attempt to re-schedule deliveries. I found this to be completely unprofessional and unacceptable. I cancelled my order and was refunded my money. I am showing my rental Wednesday and it will be empty. Home Depot has hurt my business.

They pointed me in the direction I needed to go. Upon my arrival of the bath tub isles another associate was there eager and ready to assist me. He opened the merchandise and checked for defects and everything to my satisfaction. None of which I have ever experienced at lowes. name: Henry Nelson
text: I ordered my Bar tops over 9 months ago. I’m just now getting my order and it’s still wrong.  4 months ago they said my tops were in when I get there it’s was the wrong top and the measurements were off. I’m a small business and my customer is mad at me because I can’t finish a project that should have only taken 1 week. I will never go back!

name: BENTWIG HUSTLEWIND
text: Only place around for professionals to order countertops, cabinets & hardware. My father has been ordering from them for years.

name: James Callaway
text: Great friendly staff very helpful on my countertop needs.

name: Alan Cook
text: I carried measurements for kitchen and bathroom vanity countertops to the store the day we ordered. When we installed them, the depth on the bathroom vanities were 3 inches short. When I called them about it, the guy said they gave me standard depth (Even though I gave him the measurements of the cabinets). He said I would have to pay for the correct ones. I asked to speak to the manager and he said he would have to call me back. That was almost 2 weeks ago and I haven't heard back from them yet. We cut 3 inches off of the cabinets and drawers to keep from dealing with them anymore. Don't waste your time. If there is a problem, it'll definitely be your fault.

name: Smilin' Joe Apparel
text: If it's hardware related, they either have or will get it pretty quick, but double verify what you are receiving is what you ordered!
